original_text: These are the men who crossed the Jordan in the first month, when it was overflowing all its banks, and put to flight all those in the valleys, to the east and to the west.
korean_text: 정월에 요단 강 물이 모든 언덕에 넘칠 때에 이 무리가 강물을 건너서 골짜기에 있는 모든 자에게 동서로 도망하게 하였더라

sentences.original_text: who crossed the Jordan in the first month
when it was overflowing all its banks
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 요단 강은 모든 제방을 넘쳐흐르고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: and put to flight all those in the valleys
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 골짜기에 있는 모든 사람들을 쫓아냈습니다

sentences.original_text: to the east and to the west
